item.title: Wstęp do algebry i teorii liczb
item.description:
Sylabus

Zasady zaliczenia

Literatura:

(1) A. Iwaszkiewicz-Rudoszańska, Wstęp do algebry i teorii liczb, Wydawnictwo Naukowe UAM, Poznań 2009.

(2) J. Rutkowski, Teoria liczb w zadaniach, Wydawnictwo Naukowe PWN, Warszawa 2018.

(3) J. Rutkowski, Algebra abstrakcyjna w zadaniach, Wydawnictwo Naukowe PWN, Warszawa 2006.

item.title: Basics of mathematics
item.description: A course conducted for Cumputer Science undegraduate students of Adam Mickiewicz University in Poznań. The course included basics of logic, set theory, calculus and probability theory.

item.title: Introduction to mathematics
item.description: A course conducted for Mathematics undegraduate students of Adam Mickiewicz University in Poznań. The course included basics of logic, set theory, calculus and probability theory.

item.title: Review of elementary mathematics
item.description: A course conducted for the first year Mathematics undegraduate students of Adam Mickiewicz University in Poznań. The course aimed at the repetition of the topics tought in high schools.
